etymology.description: Depicts a bamboo spear with a ring in the middle -> spear
etymology.interpretation: The character 矛(máo, 'spear') is a pictogram, directly illustrating the shape of a bamboo spear. The design reflects the basic components of the object it represents.

examples.chinese: 士兵举起矛(士兵舉起矛)。
古代战士用矛(古代戰士用矛)，冲锋陷阵(衝鋒陷陣)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔdài zhànshì yòng máo, chōngfēng xiànzhèn.
examples.english: Ancient warriors used spears to charge and break enemy formations.
